com.gazbert.patterns.behavioural.strategy

Class TradingEngineContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gazbert.patterns.behavioural.strategy.TradingEngineContext

  • public class TradingEngineContext
extends java.lang.Object
    The Context. The trading bot uses this to make new orders based on the latest order book.

    Clients uses this to execute trades.

    Very simple impl only deals with USD <> GBP market.

    Author:
    gazbert

    • Method Detail

      • getBuyOrder

        public com.gazbert.patterns.behavioural.strategy.Order getBuyOrder(OrderBook updatedOrderBook)
        Business method for client to call.

        In our demo, the Client is the trading bot providing latest order book it fetched from the Exchange web service.

        Parameters:
        updatedOrderBook -
        Returns:
        an order to place on the exchange, or null if strategy decided not to place order based on current data.

      • getSellOrder

        public com.gazbert.patterns.behavioural.strategy.Order getSellOrder(OrderBook updatedOrderBook)
        Business method for client to call.

        In our demo, the Client is the trading bot providing latest order book it fetched from the Exchange web service.

        Parameters:
        updatedOrderBook -
        Returns:
        an order to place on the exchange, or null if strategy decided not to place order based on current data.
